caption.p: Effects of IFE on prostaglandin E 2 (PGE 2) levels in the ulcerated gastric tissue of rats. Rats were treated with distilled water, IFE (100 or 300 mg/kg), or Stillen (300 mg/kg) 1 h prior to the administration of HCl/ethanol. Values are expressed as means ± standard deviations; n = 6/group; ** p < 0.01 and *** p < 0.001 versus the control group by one-way analysis of variance with post hoc Dunnett’s test. IFE, Inulae Flos extract.
